statements: SELECT * FROM learning_materials
SELECT title, type FROM learning_materials WHERE id = 5
SELECT id FROM learning_materials ORDER BY title DESC
SELECT * FROM learning_materials WHERE type = 'tutorial'
SELECT title, type FROM learning_materials WHERE id BETWEEN 10 AND 20
SELECT id, title, type, content FROM learning_materials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, title FROM learning_materials WHERE type = 'video' ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT * FROM learning_materials WHERE type IN ('book', 'article') AND id > 3 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT title, type FROM learning_materials WHERE id BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT id, type, content FROM learning_materials WHERE title LIKE '%database%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM learning_materials
SELECT material_id, material_title FROM learning_materials
SELECT material_title, material_type FROM learning_materials
SELECT material_id, material_title, material_type FROM learning_materials WHERE material_type = 'Video'
SELECT * FROM quizzes
SELECT * FROM learning_materials WHERE material_type = 'Video' ORDER BY material_title ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT material_id, material_type FROM learning_materials WHERE material_type = 'Audio' AND material_title LIKE '%Introduction%'
SELECT quiz_title, COUNT(*) FROM quizzes GROUP BY quiz_title ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT DISTINCT material_type FROM learning_materials WHERE material_type IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_questions ->> 'difficulty' = 'Hard'
SELECT * FROM lecture_slides ORDER BY slide_title DESC, slide_id ASC;
SELECT slide_title, slide_content FROM lecture_slides WHERE slide_id = 1;
SELECT lecture_id, COUNT(*) AS total_slides FROM lecture_slides GROUP BY lecture_id;
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE video_length > 10 ORDER BY video_length DESC;
SELECT quiz_title, question_count FROM quizzes WHERE lecture_id = 3;
SELECT slide_title, slide_content FROM lecture_slides WHERE lecture_id = 1;
SELECT video_title, video_url, video_length FROM videos WHERE video_length > 10;
SELECT quiz_title, question_count FROM quizzes WHERE question_count > 5 ORDER BY quiz_title DESC;
SELECT slide_title, slide_content FROM lecture_slides WHERE slide_id = 3;
SELECT video_title, video_length FROM videos WHERE lecture_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses WHERE enroll_count > 100;
SELECT slide_title, slide_content FROM slides WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, enroll_count FROM courses WHERE enroll_count BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT quiz_title FROM quizzes ORDER BY quiz_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses ORDER BY enroll_count DESC;
SELECT video_title, video_url FROM videos WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT slide_title, slide_content FROM slides WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, enroll_count FROM courses WHERE instructor_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY enroll_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM lecture_slides;
SELECT id, title, created_at FROM videos ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT title, question, correct_answer FROM quizzes WHERE correct_answer IS NOT NULL;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT user_id, course_id FROM enrolled_courses WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-08-15';
SELECT * FROM lecture_slides WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, created_at FROM videos WHERE duration > 10 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, question, correct_answer FROM quizzes WHERE correct_answer IS NOT NULL AND id < 10;
SELECT u.username, c.id, ec.enrollment_date FROM users u JOIN enrolled_courses ec ON u.id = ec.user_id JOIN courses c ON ec.course_id = c.id;
SELECT id, url, created_at FROM videos WHERE title LIKE 'Introduction%' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
